abstract: Coca-Cola is introducing a digital campaign for the Coca-Cola brand, aimed at teenagers, that is planned to use 61 Web sites.
snippet: Coca-Cola is introducing a digital campaign for the Coca-Cola brand, aimed at teenagers, that is planned to use 61 Web sites.
lead_paragraph: Businesses for Innovative Climate and Energy Policy, Boston, which is a project of the nonprofit organization Ceres, selected Captains of Industry, Boston, as its first agency of record. Billings were not disclosed.

headline.main: Accounts and People of Note in the Advertising Industry
